simplestack.reset.success: The config has been reset to the default values.
simplestack.commands.setamount.info: Set the amount of a held item
simplestack.commands.additem.info: Add an item to the unique items list
simplestack.commands.additem.success: The held item has been added to the config.
simplestack.commands.additemtype.info: Add the player's held item to item types list
simplestack.commands.removeitem.info: Remove the player's held item from unique items
simplestack.commands.removeitemtype.info: Remove the player's held item from item types list
simplestack.warnings.number_outside_of_r: The amount specified for {MAT} is outside of the valid range. Defaulting to 64.
simplestack.warnings.invalid_material: The material {MAT} in the config does not exist.
simplestack.warnings.invalid_unique_item: An item listed in the unique items list could not be loaded.
simplestack.warnings.invalid_list_mode: The list mode {MODE} is not a valid list mode. Defaulting to blacklist mode.
simplestack.warnings.invalid_max_amount: The default max amount specified in the config is outside of the required range (1 - 64)
simplestack.warnings.unique_item_already: That item already exists in the config.
simplestack.warnings.material_already_ex: That material already exists in the config.
simplestack.warnings.unique_item_does_no: That item does not exist in the config.
simplestack.warnings.material_does_not_e: That material does not exist in the config.
simplestack.warnings.custom_amount_does_: A customized amount for that item type does not exist in the config.
simplestack.warnings.held_item_required: You must hold an item to run this command.
